# NSView.DefinitionPresentationType

**Structure**

Presentation options for the window.

## Declaration

```swift
struct DefinitionPresentationType
```

## Presentation Values

- **dictionaryApplication**: A possible value of the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/DefinitionOptionKey/presentationType] dictionary key that invokes Dictionary application to display the definition.
- **overlay**: A possible value of the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/DefinitionOptionKey/presentationType] dictionary key that produces a small overlay window at the string location,

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Displaying Definition Windows

- **showDefinition(for:at:)**: Shows a window displaying the definition of the attributed string at the specified point.
- **showDefinition(for:range:options:baselineOriginProvider:)**: Shows a window displaying the definition of the specified range of the attributed string.
- **NSView.DefinitionOptionKey**: Keys to include in your definition.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
